answers.answer: I would def. call the dr. and ask them about this.  You never know, could be early signs of preeclampsia.

question: Hi, I was just wondering, last night I woke up and my eyes were stinging really bad, and my whole face looked kind of swollen - but there was no swelling whatsoever anywhere else. I put a cold cloth on them for a while and when I woke up I was fine. Could it have been sinus stuff? (Although my eyes usually don't sting that bad or swell like that.)
title: eyes really swollen and stinging in the middle of the night
